Power spectrum related functions.

Functions

cdm_corr_z2p5(rvals[, fudge, sigma8, ...]) Return the dark matter correlation function at separations given by rvals at z=2.5

powerspec(y, dt[, fig]) Find the power spectrum using an FFT.
